name: Gold Coin
description:
Currency traded on Palpagos Island.
Can be exchanged for items or Pals with merchants.

name: Charcoal
description:
Charcoal made from burning Wood.
It can be combined with Sulfur to create Gunpowder.

name: Cloth
description:
Cloth woven from Wool.
Required to create armor.

name: High Quality Cloth
description:
High Quality Cloth woven from a large amount of Wool.
Required to create high quality armor.

name: Coal
description:
Coal often found in caves and other places.
Required to create high quality metal.

name: Ingot
description:
A material required to create metal weapons and armor.
Refined from Ore using a furnace.

name: Ore
description:
Becomes an ingot when refined using a furnace.
Can be found in caves and other places.
There are rumors of Pals capable of detecting ore.

name: Fiber
description:
Fiber collected from trees.
A material used when creating bows, etc.

name: Gunpowder
description:
Gunpowder used to fire ammunition.
Required to make bullets.

name: Beautiful Flower
description:
A plant that blooms colorful flowers.
Can be used to make Suspicious Juice and Strange Juice.

name: Refined Ingot
description:
A material required to create high quality metal weapons and armor.
Refined from Ore and Coal using a furnace.

name: Leather
description:
Leather taken from a Pal, it serves as a defensive material.
It can be obtained from certain Pals.

name: Nail
description:
Necessary for building various facilities.
Can be made with a Primitive Workbench.

name: Circuit Board
description:
Required to create precision equipment.
Can be made with a Production Assembly Line.

name: Pal Metal Ingot
description:
Material required to create weapons and armor using Pal Metal.
Made stronger by creating an alloy from metal and Paldium.

name: Stone
description:
Material for structures and items.
Can be obtained by mining rocks.

name: Paldium Fragment
description:
Crystallized energy from the World Tree.
Capable of creating supernatural items and structures.

name: Berry Seeds
description:
Seeds that produce Red Berries.
Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be obtained when picking Red Berries.

name: Tomato Seeds
description:
Seeds that produce Tomato.
Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be purchased from a merchant.

name: Lettuce Seeds
description:
Seeds that produce Lettuce.
Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be purchased from a merchant.

name: Wheat Seeds
description:
Seeds that produce Wheat.
Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be purchased from a merchant.

name: Wood
description:
Material for structures and items.
Can be obtained by cutting trees.

name: Wool
description:
Material sheared from sheep Pals.
A necessity for creating bedding, Cloth and more.

name: Crude Oil
description:
A material that can be processed into various products.
Obtained by installing a Crude Oil Extractor in an oil field.

name: Plasteel
description:
Plasteel created by processing Crude Oil and metal.
Can be produced in a Electric Furnace.

name: Ruby
description:
A gemstone that glows red.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

name: Sapphire
description:
A gemstone that glows blue.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

name: Emerald
description:
A gemstone that glows green.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

name: Diamond
description:
A rare gemstone that glows brilliantly.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

name: Common Egg
description:
A Common Egg.
Something gentle moves within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Common Egg
description:
A Common Egg.
Something gentle moves within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Common Egg
description:
A Large Common Egg.
A calm rhythm beats within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Common Egg
description:
A Large Common Egg.
A calm rhythm beats within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Huge Common Egg
description:
A Huge Common Egg.
A gentle spirit throbs within—as if a monster is about to be born.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Scorching Egg
description:
A Scorching Egg.
Something hot moves within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Scorching Egg
description:
A Scorching Egg.
Something hot moves within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Scorching Egg
description:
A Large Scorching Egg.
Passion burns from within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Scorching Egg
description:
A Large Scorching Egg.
Passion burns from within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Huge Scorching Egg
description:
A Huge Scorching Egg.
A blazing spirit burns within—as if a monster is about to be born.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Damp Egg
description:
A Damp Egg.
Something swims within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Damp Egg
description:
A Damp Egg.
Something swims within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Damp Egg
description:
A Large Damp Egg.
Purity swirls within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Damp Egg
description:
A Large Damp Egg.
Purity swirls within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Huge Damp Egg
description:
A Huge Damp Egg.
A tranquil spirit sways within—as if a monster is about to be born.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Verdant Egg
description:
A Verdant Egg.
Something lively moves within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Verdant Egg
description:
A Verdant Egg.
Something lively moves within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Verdant Egg
description:
A Large Verdant Egg.
A strong life force dwells within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Verdant Egg
description:
A Large Verdant Egg.
A strong life force dwells within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Huge Verdant Egg
description:
A Huge Verdant Egg.
A verdant spirit grows within—as if a monster is about to be born.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Electric Egg
description:
An Electric Egg.
Something energetic moves within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Electric Egg
description:
An Electric Egg.
Something energetic moves within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Electric Egg
description:
An Large Electric Egg.
A pulsing energy stirs within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Electric Egg
description:
An Large Electric Egg.
A pulsing energy stirs within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Huge Electric Egg
description:
An Huge Electric Egg.
A raging spirit grows within—as if a monster is about to be born.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Frozen Egg
description:
An Frozen Egg.
Something cold stirs within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Frozen Egg
description:
An Frozen Egg.
Something cold stirs within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Frozen Egg
description:
An Large Frozen Egg.
An icy pulse pounds within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Frozen Egg
description:
An Large Frozen Egg.
An icy pulse pounds within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Huge Frozen Egg
description:
An Huge Frozen Egg.
A frigid spirit stirs within—as if a monster is about to be born.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Rocky Egg
description:
An Rocky Egg.
Something calm stirs within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Rocky Egg
description:
An Rocky Egg.
Something calm stirs within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Rocky Egg
description:
An Large Rocky Egg.
A dignified rumble drums within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Rocky Egg
description:
An Large Rocky Egg.
A dignified rumble drums within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Huge Rocky Egg
description:
An Huge Rocky Egg.
An earthly spirit resounds within—as if a monster is about to be born.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Dark Egg
description:
A Dark Egg.
Something chaotic stirs within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Dark Egg
description:
A Dark Egg.
Something chaotic stirs within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Dark Egg
description:
A Large Dark Egg.
A vicious wail howls within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Dark Egg
description:
A Large Dark Egg.
A vicious wail howls within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Huge Dark Egg
description:
A Huge Dark Egg.
A shadowy spirit cries within—as if a monster is about to be born.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Dragon Egg
description:
A Dragon Egg.
Something mischievous stirs within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Dragon Egg
description:
A Dragon Egg.
Something mischievous stirs within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Dragon Egg
description:
An Large Dragon Egg.
A strange movement pulses within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Large Dragon Egg
description:
An Large Dragon Egg.
A strange movement pulses within.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Huge Dragon Egg
description:
A Huge Dragon Egg.
A solemn spirit echoes within—as if a monster is about to be born.
Place in a Egg Incubator to incubate it.

name: Ancient Civilization Parts
description:
Debris excavated from ancient ruins.
Contains abundant information on lost technology.
Extremely valuable, people from all walks of life are now seeking such crystals.

name: Small Pal Soul
description:
A spirit left behind by a small Pal.
It can draw out hidden abilities if offered to a Statue of Power.

name: Medium Pal Soul
description:
A spirit left behind by a Pal.
It can draw out hidden abilities if offered to a Statue of Power.

name: Large Pal Soul
description:
A spirit left behind by a large Pal.
It can draw out hidden abilities if offered to a Statue of Power.

name: Sulfur
description:
Sulfur that can be found in volcanoes and such.
Necessary for making Gunpowder.

name: Pure Quartz
description:
Pure Quartz often found in snowy fields and similar places.
Required to create Circuit Board.

name: High Quality Pal Oil
description:
High-quality oil that can be extracted from Pal.
Necessary for making Polymer.

name: Polymer
description:
Made from refined oil.
Required for producing various advanced items such as rifles.

name: Electric Organ
description:
Material obtainable from Electric Pals.
It stores electricity, but requires caution when used.

name: Venom Gland
description:
Material obtainable from poisonous Pals.
Can be used to make Poison Arrow and more.

name: Flame Organ
description:
Material obtainable from Fire Pals.
Can be used to make Fire Arrow and more.

name: Ice Organ
description:
Material obtainable from Ice Pals.
Can be used to make Ice Mine and more.

name: Bone
description:
Bone collected from Pals.
Used in the creation of high quality Paldium.

name: Cement
description:
Cement used for creating structures and more.
Can be produced in a High Quality Workbench.

name: Carbon Fiber
description:
A lightweight yet sturdy material.
Used to create armor among other equipment.

name: Horn
description:
Horn collected from Pals.
Used to create medicines and more.

name: Pal Fluids
description:
Body fluids taken from a Pal.
Useful for its high viscosity.

name: Tocotoco Feather
description:
Feathers dropped from a Tocotoco.
Used to make clothing, as the beautifully vivid colors are quite popular.

name: Gumoss Leaf
description:
Leaf dropped from a Gumoss.
Fresh and sticky, it is used to make clothing.

name: Penking Plume
description:
Plume dropped from a Penking.
Bright and colorful, it is used to make clothing.

name: Katress Hair
description:
Hair dropped from a Katress.
Soft and supple, it is used to make clothing.

name: Precious Dragon Stone
description:
A gemstone-like ball collected from Pals.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

name: Precious Plume
description:
Glittering feathers collected from Pals.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

name: Precious Entrails
description:
A heart that never stops beating collected from Pals.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

name: Precious Claw
description:
Extremely sharp claws collected from Pals.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

name: Precious Pelt
description:
Fluffy fur collected from Pals.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

name: Ancient Civilization Core
description:
Core from technology that was lost long ago.
Nearly impossible to find on the Palpagos Islands, it contains a wealth of forgotten knowledge.

name: Life Lotus (S)
description:
Small green flower that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Needed to make Vital Remedy.

name: Stamina Lotus (S)
description:
Small yellow flower that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Needed to make Stamina Remedy.

name: Power Lotus (S)
description:
Small red flower that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Needed to make Might Remedy.

name: Speed Lotus (S)
description:
Small orange flower that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Needed to make Speed Remedy.

name: Carrying Lotus (S)
description:
Small purple flower that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Needed to make Burden Remedy.

name: Ribbuny Ribbon
description:
Ribbon dropped from a Ribbuny.
Cute in color and design, it is used to make clothing.

name: Swee Hair
description:
Hair dropped from a Swee.
Fluffy and soft, it is used to make clothing.

name: Killamari Tentacle
description:
Tentacle dropped from a Killamari.
Strange in texture, it is used to make clothing.

name: Dazzi Cloud
description:
Cloud dropped from a Dazzi.
Soft and fluffy, it is used to make clothing.

name: Leezpunk Crest
description:
Crest dropped from a Leezpunk.
Sharp and pointy, it is used to make clothing.

name: Life Lotus (L)
description:
Large green flower that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Needed to make Vital Elixir.

name: Stamina Lotus (L)
description:
Large yellow flower that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Needed to make Stamina Elixir.

name: Power Lotus (L)
description:
Large red flower that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Needed to make Might Elixir.

name: Speed Lotus (L)
description:
Large orange flower that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Needed to make Speed Elixir.

name: Carrying Lotus (L)
description:
Large purple flower that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Needed to make Burden Elixir.

name: Meteorite Fragment
description:
Fragment of a rock from outer space.
Contains large amounts of Paldium Fragment,
which can be extracted by placing it in a Crusher.

name: Dog Coin
description:
A mysterious coin. Apparently there are people who collect these.
A Mimog will usually have them, but
for some reason, they cannot be obtained by butchering it.

name: Giant Pal Soul
description:
The soul left behind by a highly trained Pal.
It can draw out hidden abilities if offered to a Statue of Power.

name: Potato Seeds
description:
Seeds that produce Potato.
Necessary for starting a farm.

name: Carrot Seeds
description:
Seeds that produce Carrot>.
Necessary for starting a farm.

name: Onion Seeds
description:
Seeds that produce Onion.
Necessary for starting a farm.

name: Predator Core
description:
Core dropped by Predator Pals.
It is filled with mysterious energy.

name: Successful Bounty Token
description:
A token of having defeated a bounty target.
By giving it to a Vigilante Bounty Officer in villages or towns, it can be exchanged for a reward.

name: Ancient Pal Manuscript
description:
An ancient manuscript written on Pal hide. It may be found by Pals during expeditions. 
Required for advancing research.

name: Chromite
description:
A type of metal buried underground. 
It can be detected with a Metal Detector on certain islands.

name: Hexolite
description:
An alloy of Chromite, Ingot, and Hexolite Quartz. 
Used as materials for advanced equipment and structures.

name: Nightstar Sand
description:
Sand that can be found in the desert at night. 
Used as a material for crafting certain accessories and other items.

name: Dark Fragment
description:
Dropped by some powerful Dark Pals. 
Used as a material for crafting powerful accessories and other items.

name: Hexolite Quartz
description:
A rare crystal found only in Feybreak. 
Over many years, Paladium has condensed and transformed, now shining with a rainbow-like glow.
